meanings.sent2: He was fetishising his favorite sports team, always wearing their jersey.
meanings.sent3: The way he fetishised his old hat was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of fetishising her morning routine turned it into a sacred ritual.
meanings.sent5: The child fetishised his toy car, treating it like a precious treasure.
